text: “Ndipo m’gulu la nyama, (Allah adalenga) zonyamulira katundu ndi zopangira choyala (bweya bwake). Idyani zimene Allah wakupatsani ndipo musatsate mapazi a satana (ndi abwenzi ake pozichita halali kapena haramu zomwe Allah sadalamule. Satana sakufunirani zabwino); ndithu iye ndi mdani wanu woonekera
